title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: John Beam, Football Coach Who Was Focus of Netflix’s ‘Last Chance U,’ Dies After Being Shot
items.description: An arrest was made in the shooting of the coaching fixture John Beam, who died from his injuries in the shooting at Laney College in Oakland, Calif., ...

items.title: A Reopened Government Hasn’t Ended Delays to Economic Data
items.description: Jobs and inflation data will be released late and with caveats, complicating the Federal Reserve’s interest rate deliberations.

items.title: The Strategic Uncoupling of Zohran Mamdani and Brad Lander
items.description: Mr. Lander, the New York City comptroller, campaigned with Mr. Mamdani and once hoped to join him in City Hall. Now he is eyeing a congressional seat.

items.title: Scientists pull ancient RNA from a woolly mammoth's body
items.description: Scientists have extracted the oldest RNA molecules out of a woolly mammoth, gaining a snapshot into the processes at work in the extinct mammal's body...

items.title: Seizures, broken spines and vomiting: Scientific testing that helped facilitate D-Day
items.description: Biomedical engineer Rachel Lance says British scientists submitted themselves to experiments that would be considered unethical today. Her book is Cha...

items.title: In Kansas and elsewhere, some state lawmakers are skeptical of the redistricting rush
items.description: Kansas Republican leaders couldn't rally enough support this fall for a special session on redistricting. It's just one example of lawmakers pushing b...

items.title: A storm devastated Alaska Native villages. Now their public media lost funding

items.title: Trump Plan Could Limit Green Cards for Immigrants From Travel Ban Countries

items.title: Indigenous People Take the Stage at COP30 Climate Talks in Belém, Brazil
items.description: This summit is unlike any of its predecessors in at least one significant way: The Indigenous presence is palpable and strong.

items.title: Zelensky Ousted a Heavyweight Mayor. Was It a Power Grab?
items.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky removed Odesa’s mayor, raising fears he might be using his wartime powers to tighten control over opposition-run cities.

items.description: The Trump administration wants the Security Council to adopt a resolution that has the 20-point U.S. plan annexed, effectively making it international...

items.title: Stock Market Rally Is Dented as Signs of Worry Emerge
items.description: Choppy trading shows how investors are balancing a “fear of missing out at the same time as real fear.”
